Pocatello.KIDG: KIDG is a commercial radio station located in Pocatello, Idaho, broadcasting on 92.1 FM. KIDG airs a news/talk format, simulcasting KID 590 AM. The call letters were changed from KPPC to KEGE on March 7, 2008 to match the station's previous "Edge" branding and then changed to KIDG on December 7, 2015.
